Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli

Class CliCommandCreator

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.CliCommandCreator
public class CliCommandCreator
extends java.lang.Object
this class represent the cli command creator. in particular, it is a container of methods used to handle the cli commands

  • Method Details

    • initialiseResources

      protected Command initialiseResources​(java.io.BufferedReader stdIn, int position) throws java.io.IOException, java.security.InvalidParameterException
      this method handle the initialization of the initial resources of the player
      Parameters:
      stdIn - this is the buffer reader
      position - this is the position of the player based on the inkwell one
      Returns:
      the command to send to the server
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if a network error occurs
      java.security.InvalidParameterException - if the parameters chosen are not valid
